match_summary: Tottenham produced a stunning upset at the Etihad Stadium, defeating Manchester City 2-0 in a masterclass of counter-attacking football. Despite City dominating possession, Spurs were clinical in their finishing and resolute in defense.
key_moments: 23' - Joao Palhinha opens scoring with a powerful header from a corner
45' - Guglielmo Vicario makes crucial save to deny Erling Haaland
67' - Mohammed Kudus doubles the lead with a brilliant solo effort
78' - City's best chance falls to Kevin De Bruyne but shot goes wide
90' - Tottenham hold on for famous victory
